keywords: Meat pizza,Seafood free,Sesame free,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: BBQ Meatlovers Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 12 slices Primo double smoked leg ham (approx. 80g)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven 220°C / 200°C (fanforced). Grease 2 pizza or oven trays.
Divide the ingredients to spread evenly over each of the pizza bases.
Spread pizza sauce evenly over the base. Scatter over half of the Perfect Pizza cheese on each. Top with salami and ham slices.
Sprinkle over remaining cheese. Bake 12 minutes or until cheese is golden and melted and crust is crisp
Drizzle over BBQ sauce. Slice and serve immediately.
